text.KJV: For God so loved the world...
text.ESV: For God so loved the world...
text.NIV: For God so loved the world...
text.NKJV: For God so loved the world...

text.KJV: The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want.
text.ESV: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.
text.NIV: The Lord is my shepherd, I lack nothing.
text.NKJV: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.
text.CSB: The Lord is my shepherd; I have what I need.
